sectionHeading: How you can get funding today

step1.title: Submit & Verify
step1.description1: Submit your project profile with documentation of impactful purposes. Our team verifies 501(c)(3) alignment to enable tax-deductible donations.

step2.title: Engage During Voting
step2.description1: After approval, your project enters voting where community members can vote and donate. Votes from users who have completed verification, have donated, and who have contributed to social and environmental projects carry more impact, giving your project a better chance of funding.

step3.title: Receive Dual Funding
step3.description1: After voting, scores are calculated using Extended Quadratic Funding, based upon which you'll receive direct donations plus matching grants.
step3.description2: Your funding amount combines both financial support from Socious Fund and community endorsement. Learn more about

step4.title: Launch & Report Impact
step4.description: Launch your project and report regularly on impact metrics and milestones to maintain transparency and strengthen community trust.

tip1.title: Tips for optimizing your results
points: Verify on Socious Fund with KYC
Contribute a donation to your project
Receive impact points based on their past social efforts
Share and refer others and encourage them to verify, vote, and donate

tip2.title: Tips for telling your story
points: Start with a personal story sharing why this issue matters
Give your project a memorable title
Clearly outline your goals, and milestones
Form a connection with your donors, and consider your story from their point of view

tip3.title: Tips for sharing your project
points: Start sharing your Socious Fund project from day 1, and promote often
Use compelling images and videos to enhance engagement
Share your project link with social media groups, and organizations with similar interests
Step outside of your direct network, and actively update throughout the voting period
Highlight timely moments or milestones to drive urgency

final.heading: With Socious Fund's transparent fees, KYC verification process, and a team of support staff, you can rest assured that your funds are secure, and are directly supporting impactful projects.
